name: Food Tours
description: Discover India through its flavours. Join guided food walks through bustling markets, sample street food with locals, and learn the stories behind iconic dishes.

name: Nature
description: Encounter India's incredible biodiversity. Safari through national parks, trek in the Himalayas, and witness wildlife in their natural habitats.

name: Cultural
description: Walk through centuries of history with expert guides. Explore ancient monuments, hidden alleyways, and architectural wonders on foot.

name: Arts and Crafts
description: Create with your hands in traditional craft workshops. Learn block printing, pottery, weaving, and other artisan skills passed down through generations.

name: Walking Tours
description: Explore neighbourhoods on foot with local guides. Discover hidden gems, street art, and local stories you'd never find on your own.

name: Adventure
description: Push your boundaries with thrilling experiences. From white-water rafting to paragliding, find your adrenaline rush across India's diverse landscapes.
